name: TikDog
description:
The most influential dog since the invention of dogs lost all his Instadog followers!

 Explore a lively town full of obscure dogs, sights and secrets and turn your interactions into viral social media content on the hunt for internet fame!

  • 🏡 Explore a lively 3D town full of secrets to discover
  • 🐕Meet unique characters like the pro skater Tony Dawg or a fox (almost counts as a dog)
  • 💖All dogs are based on real pictures of our dogs <3
  • 📢You can bark!

############

Controls 

[WASD / STICKS] Move
[LEFT MOUSE / A Button] Interaction and bark

############

by
